metadata.title: FitPro Adjustable 8" Wrist and Thumb Spica Support With Removable Insert- Left, X-Small, Amazon Exclusive Brand
features: Durable, lightweight material is Lycra-lined for breathability and comfort
Removable and malleable aluminum palmar stay provides support for palmar surface of wrist and extensor surface of thumb
Constructed of a lightweight, durable material
Size X-Small fits a wrist circumference of 5. 25" - 6. 25"
description: The 8" Adjustable Thumb Spica is a great solution for wrist/thumb support and immobilization. Constructed of a lightweight, durable material, this brace offers maximum protection and is Lycra-lined for breathability and comfort. Removable and malleable aluminum palmar stay provides support for palmar surface of wrist and extensor surface of thumb. FitPro is an exclusive brand backed by over 40 years of experience designing and manufacturing bracing solutions for retail and health professionals. d of six months from date of purchase.
